respStmt.resp: This TEI event record is created by the

availability.p: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License.

event.label: Label/title of the event
event.desc: Date or date-range of the event Please fill in the "when" attribute values for single dates or the "from" and "to" attributes for date ranges. Attribute values consisting of dates must be formatted as: YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD. (e.g., 2010, 2010-10, 2010-10-31) , location of the event
event.note: Use multiple description tags for a multi-paragraph description.
Scholar note optional - delete if none.

listBibl.bibl: Source of event description and/or note optional - delete list bibl if none; multiple sources-separate bibl tags

note.note: To make the event more discoverable, please add at least one keyword; to add more than one keyword, an additional note element with a child term element should be created for each additional keyword.
